entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snowshower, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 08:30 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
Condition: Snowshower
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: N 24 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 07:57 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 except minus 11 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 07:57 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then northeast 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:57 AM NDT Thursday 23 March 2023
